channel.title: "Solved" feature for topics
channel.description: Just wanted to throw it out there. Is there a way to mark topics as solved? Would be nice especially for the support section. So much easier to look for a problem you're experiencing and see if it's already been solved elsewhere.

item.title: "Solved" feature for topics
item.dc:creator: @GiorgosK Giorgos Kontopoulos
item.description:
@GiorgosK wrote:

@Mufasa
Great idea
The easy solution was and I already did create tag resolved so moderators at least can tag issues as resolved

So far there is only 1 request that we were not able to resolve for luck of response from user
so I marked all support requests as resolved.

One can go to tags from their profile menu (next to the avatar) and choose “resolved” or even use it in search like this tag:resolved

If a need comes for anything more sophisticated than this will consider it.

Read full topic
